item.description:
“Image Makers”

Boston Fashion Industry meetup subgroup
for models, photographers, mua and stylist.

This meetup is a life style/fashion photo shoot in a contemporary residence. Ron Ranere of Positive Image Photography will be the creative director for this shoot. We need at least 2 designers’ lines to shoot. . We also need models, makeup artist and stylist. Models will sign a release and photographers will provide everyone who participates with a low res digital copy of the images.

Please RSVP here if you are interested in participating. If you are a designer with a line that you want shot by this group please email me at ron@positiveimage-boston.com and tell me about your line. There is a limit of 20 for this meetup so RSVP early.

I have hired a makeup artist. None of the makeup artist in meetup are available.

Thanks

Ron Ranere
Positive Image
Photography
135 Massachusetts Ave
Boston MA 02115
617-542-2118
www.positiveimage-boston.com
item.name: " IMAGE MAKERS GROUP"
